description:
For all your cold-weather training and running needs. The paneled construction puts protection and ventilation where you need it most, while articulated elbows ensure a full range of motion when running or stretching.

  • Recycled polyester ripstop WindWall™ overlay stops chilly wind in its tracks
  • Gridded recycled poly blend fleece locks in body heat and wicks away moisture
  • Breathable fleece vents excess heat
  • PFC-free DWR finish lets this hoodie shake off light rain and trail muck
  • Quarter zip and three-piece hood provide coverage options
  • On-seam pockets keep your hands warms while waiting at crosswalks
  • Thumb loops add coverage to the back of your hand and keep the sleeves from riding up while you’re on the move
  • Reflective logo improves visibility in low light
  • Trim athletic fit lies close to your body
name: The North Face Winter Warm Pro 1/4 Zip Hoodie - Men's
